thread.title: BRIEF-Arista Networks Says ‍On March 23, Administrative Law Judge At International Trade Commission Issued A Recommended Determination​

title: BRIEF-Arista Networks Says ‍On March 23, Administrative Law Judge At International Trade Commission Issued A Recommended Determination​

organizations.name: international trade commission issued a recommended determination
international trade commission issued a recommended determination​ reuters

text:
30 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Arista Networks Says ‍On March 23, Administrative Law Judge At International Trade Commission Issued A Recommended Determination​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - Arista Networks Inc: 
* ARISTA NETWORKS SAYS ‍ON MARCH 23, ADMINISTRATIVE LAW JUDGE AT INTERNATIONAL TRADE COMMISSION ISSUED A RECOMMENDED DETERMINATION - SEC FILING​ 
* ARISTA NETWORKS INC - ‍ITC ISSUED RD IN ITC 945 MODIFICATION PROCEEDING INITIATED BY CISCO SYSTEMS, AGAINST ARISTA NETWORKS 
* ARISTA NETWORKS - ‍ALJ FOUND CO’S REDESIGNED PRODUCTS DO NOT INFRINGE UNITED STATES PATENT NO. 6,377,577 & DO INFRINGE UNITED STATES PATENT NO. 7,224,668​ 
* ARISTA NETWORKS INC - ‍BOTH PATENT TRIAL & APPEAL BOARD AND FEDERAL CIRCUIT DETERMINED ‘668 PATENT TO BE UNPATENTABLE ON ALL RELEVANT CLAIMS​ 
* ARISTA NETWORKS INC - ‍ALJ SUPPORTED SUSPENSION OF REMEDIES CONCERNING '668 PATENT PENDING COMPLETION OF CISCO'S APPEALS OF DECISION​ Source text: [ bit.ly/2I99l2V ] Further company coverage:
